column1: Kolea (Arabic: القليعة‎) is a city in Tipaza Province
column3: located approximately 17 miles (27 km) southwest of Algiers. Its population in 2010 was 46

column1: Kolea was founded in 1550 by Hayreddin Barbarossa. In 1838
column2: Lamoricère moved there with his regiment of Zouaves and built four forts: at Fouka
